general: Today, the Moon in Cancer illuminates your sensitivity and intuition. You feel in tune with your emotions and those of others. Embrace this energy to strengthen your family and friendship bonds, as these relationships will bring you warmth and comfort.
love: Dare to express your feelings, it will bring you closer to your partner.
work: Stay attentive to the details, a project may require your finesse.
health: Take the time to relax and meditate, it will revitalize you.
advice: Listen to your heart, it always knows what to do.
teaser: Intense emotions and deep connections today.
